description: This file is an HTML document that serves as the front-end user interface for a database viewer. It includes structure, styles, and client-side JavaScript code to load, display, and interact with database and table data, providing features such as refresh, expandable cells, and dynamic loading.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of available databases.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list, resetting current selections.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses a database to show its tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data from a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders fetched table data into an HTML table.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Returns HTML for a cell, handling various data types including objects and long texts.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses a cell to show full content.
